entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.36
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for running template actions on Tasks and Projects

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.35...v5.10.36
